Text:
Uni-5: The World's Enemy is the eighth studio album by Bone Thugs-N-Harmony released 
on May 4, 2010 on BTNH Worldwide with distribution via Warner Bros. Records. The mixtape,
The Fixtape Vol. 3: Special Delivery features cuts from this album.

The first single, "See Me Shine", featuring Lyfe Jennings, Phaedra and Jay Rush was released
on October 20, 2009. The second single from the album is "Rebirth" featuring Thin C, was 
released on February 15, 2010 The song was produced by Pooh Bear and King David. The albums 
third single "Meet Me in the Sky" was released on March 22, 2010. "Gangsta's Glory" was 
released as a free download on the group's official website on January 28th, 2010. 
The song was produced by Matt Velo... 

For Promotional Use Only... Remember to support the artists...
